A pigeon cage is a quest item used in Biohazard and One Small Favour. The latter requires the use of 5 cages and are turned into chicken cages by using a steel bar. The answer to the medium clue asking how many are behind Jerico's house is 3.

It can be found in the garden behind Jerico's house, immediately south of the northern bank in East Ardougne.

A '''pigeon cage''' is a quest item used in [[Biohazard]] and [[One Small Favour]]. The latter requires the use of 5 cages and are turned into [[chicken cage]]s by using a [[steel bar]]. The answer to the medium clue asking how many are behind Jerico's house is 3.

It can be found in the garden behind [[Jerico]]'s house, immediately south of the northern bank in [[East Ardougne]].
